name: Steady State
description:
This game was developed for the BrainJam March 2021. The theme was 'drag&drop'

How to play

Drag one piece from your pile and drop it on your opponents pile. Try to place it in such a way that your opponents pile gets unstable and collapses.

Game end

The player who’s pile is no longer high enough – it does not reach the green plane – will loose the game.

Global events

When the progress bar is full the event – that is announced with the picture – will take place. Both piles will have the same event.

More details in the game. Have fun playing it :)
